property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the GalleyPreference (a Application or Document).

property.name: backgroundColor
property.shortdesc: The background color, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as an InCopy UI color. . Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

property.name: cursorType
property.shortdesc: The cursor type for galley and story views.

property.name: smoothText
property.shortdesc: If true, galley text is anti-aliased.

property.name: textColor
property.shortdesc: The text color, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as an InCopy UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

property.name: showDepthRuler
property.shortdesc: If true, displays the depth ruler.

property.name: antiAliasType
property.shortdesc: The type of text anti-aliasing to use in story and galley views.

property.name: showParagraphStyleNames
property.shortdesc: If true, show paragraph style names.

property.name: displayFont
property.shortdesc: Font family name to use for text display.

property.name: displayFontSize
property.shortdesc: Size to use for text display.

property.name: showInfoColumn
property.shortdesc: If true, display the Info column.

property.name: showParagraphBreakMarks
property.shortdesc: If true, show paragraph break marks.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the GalleyPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
